    • Method Detail

      • receiveActionPotential

        public void receiveActionPotential(Edge i)
        Receives a signal from the given synapse. Note that the Edge must already be connected to this Node but that any connected neighbor may send an action potential because this is an UndirectedNode.
        Specified by:
        receiveActionPotential in class UndirectedNode
        Parameters:
        i - the Edge containing the synaptic input to be received.

      • sendActionPotential

        public void sendActionPotential(Edge o)
        Send a signal to the given synapse. Note that the Edge must already be connected to this Node but that any connected neighbor may receive an action potential because this is an UndirectedNode.
        Specified by:
        sendActionPotential in class UndirectedNode
        Parameters:
        o - the Edge containing the synaptic input to be sent.

      • fire

        public boolean fire()
        Determines whether or not this Node has a high enough stored value to meet the firing threshold and send an action potential.
        Specified by:
        fire in class UndirectedNode
        Returns:
        true if value >= threshold; returns false otherwise

      • sigmoidFire

        public boolean sigmoidFire()
        Determines whether or not the sigmoid of the value stored by this Node is enough to meet the firing threshold and send an action potential.
        Specified by:
        sigmoidFire in class UndirectedNode
        Returns:
        true if sigmoid(value) >= threshold; returns false otherwise
